title: Amount of mechanical energy lost in collision

content.prompt: The two blocks of masses M and 2M shown above initially travel at the same speed v but in opposite directions. They collide and stick together. How much mechanical energy is lost to other forms of energy during the collision?

choices.label: 1 2 M v 2 MathType@MTEF@5@5@@3C03@

3 4 M v 2 MathType@MTEF@5@5@@3C07@

4 3 M v 2 MathType@MTEF@5@5@@3C07@

3 2 M v 2 MathType@MTEF@5@5@@3C05@

skill.text: 2.A: Derive a symbolic expression from known quantities by selecting and following a logical mathematical pathway.
